replies.bodyText: See the snapshot - it is again containing MockedProvider and other wrapping components. Is that a sideeffect of wrapper=wrapper.update() ? ... if so, we might need to do find() on the updated wrapper before taking snapshot.
replies.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: removed the unwanted MockedProvider from the snapshots and testing only what is required
replies.author: AjayJagan

timeline.bodyText: Is this necessary? - just simulate click in await act, close the act(()=>{}) and check the wrapper. Then for next click again open act(()=>{}) do the click, close, and check wrapper. This solution seems more complex than it could.
timeline.author: jstastny-cz
